Name: Identifier
Description: This field is used to record an identifier attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Identifier Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of the identifier attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Identifier Provider
Description: This field is used to record the institution, group or individual responsible for providing the documented physical information carrier's identifier.

Name: Identifier Source
Description: This field is used to record the source based on which the identifier was attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Name
Description: This field is used to record the main name attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Name Language
Description: This field is used to record the language of the main name attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Alternative Name
Description: This field is used to record an alternative  name under which the documented physical information carrier is known.

Name: Alternative Name Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of the alternative name that has been attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Alternative Name Language
Description: This field is used to record the language of the alternative name attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Alternative Name Use Period - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest known date for use of the alternative name attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Alternative Name Use Period - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest known date for use of the alternative name attributed to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Alternative Name - Attributed by
Description: This field is used to record the organization or individual attributing the alternative name to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Alternative Name - Source
Description: This field is used to record the source on the basis of which the organization attributing the alternative name use based their attribution.

Name: Type
Description: This field is used to record the formal type of the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Type Attributor
Description: This field is used to record the institution, group or individual responsible for attributing the formal type to the documented physical information carrier.

Name: Type Qualifying Description
Description: This field is used to record a description of the formal type attributed to the documented physical information carrier using free text.
